title: Insulation
fullText:
Earthing conductors shall be provided with insulation.
Exceptions: The following forms of earthing conductors need not be provided with insulation:
1.	Aerial conductors.
2.	Flat braided conductors.
3.	Busbars.
4.	Sheaths of MIMS cable.
5.	Conductive framework and wiring enclosures deemed to be an earthing conductor, in accordance with Clause 5.3.2.2.
6.	Copper earthing conductors buried directly in the ground in accordance with Clause 5.5.5.5.
7.	Catenary wires.
